recipe.title: Vegetable Curry
recipe.description: Hearty Indian curry packed with seasonal vegetables

steps.descr: Sauté onion until soft, add curry powder
steps.instructions: Sauté onion until soft, add curry powder

on_enter.say: Right, let's get started by sautéing the onion until it's nice and soft. Then we'll add the curry powder for that lovely aroma.

steps.descr: Add all vegetables, stir to coat in spices
steps.instructions: Add all vegetables, stir to coat in spices

on_enter.say: Now, let's add all those beautiful vegetables and give them a good stir to coat them in the spices. They'll start to smell fantastic!

steps.descr: Pour in coconut milk and 200ml water
steps.instructions: Pour in coconut milk and 200ml water

on_enter.say: Let's pour in the coconut milk and about two hundred milliliters of water. This will give us a lovely creamy base.

steps.descr: Simmer for 20 minutes until vegetables are tender
steps.instructions: Simmer for 20 minutes until vegetables are tender

on_enter.say: Time to let it simmer for about twenty minutes until the vegetables are tender. You'll know it's ready when they are soft and full of flavor.

steps.descr: Add chickpeas and cook 5 more minutes
steps.instructions: Add chickpeas and cook 5 more minutes

on_enter.say: Now, let's add the chickpeas and cook for another five minutes. This will warm them through and blend all those lovely flavors together.
Let's season our curry with a pinch of salt to taste. Remember, you can always add more, but you can't take it out!

steps.descr: Garnish with fresh coriander, serve with rice or naan
steps.instructions: Garnish with fresh coriander, serve with rice or naan

on_enter.say: Time to garnish with some fresh coriander and serve it up with your choice of rice or naan. Enjoy your delicious homemade curry!

notes.text:
Use whatever vegetables you have on hand
Add spinach at the end for extra nutrition
Make it spicy with fresh chilies
